description: Driven by curiosity and a desire to uncover truth or meaning.
Action-oriented, focused on completing tasks efficiently.
Enjoys creating systems, frameworks, or tangible results from ideas.
Explores through experimentation, often nonlinear and hands-on.
Introspective and interested in understanding self and emotion.
Goal-driven, assertive, and prefers control over process and outcomes.
Less interested in destinations, more drawn to ideas, vibes, or novelty.
